CustomField.description: SF-31942 - Resubmission Due Date for the resubmission mode, where applicable. Proposals cannot be resubmitted after this date. Entering a value here indicates that the solicitation will accept resubmission once initiated from the proposal review page by designated users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Resubmission Due Date for the resubmission mode, where applicable. Proposals cannot be resubmitted after this date. Entering a value here indicates that the solicitation will accept resubmission once initiated from the proposal review page by designated users.
CustomField.label: Resubmission Due Date
